function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 in buildings","Impact":"Increased infection rates and health risks for building occupants","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, reducing crowding, and promoting good indoor environmental quality","Technologies":"HVAC systems with advanced filtration, occupancy monitoring systems, indoor air quality sensors","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Health and economic crises worldwide, restrictions on travel and activities","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns, travel restrictions, public health measures, and economic support","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing and tracing technology, remote work technology, economic stimulus tools","People":"General population, travelers, businesses, governments","Owner":"Public health agencies, governments, businesses, global organizations"},{"Description":"Negative impact on economic progress","Impact":"Loss of income, business closures, and reduced economic growth","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus packages, support for affected industries, and investment in remote work infrastructure","Technologies":"Financial aid systems, remote work tools, business support platforms","People":"Workers, business owners, investors","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, businesses"}]}
